404.title: Page not found
404.subtext_html: The page you were looking for could not be found. {{ link }}.

search.no_articles: There were no articles or pages found matching '{{ search_terms }}'.
search.no_products: There were no products found matching '{{ search_terms }}'.
search.no_results: Your search for '{{ search_terms }}' has returned no results.
search.results_text: Search for '{{ search_terms }}' returned {{ results_count }} {{ results }}

social.instagram_error: Please verify your Access token for Instagram.

goal.title_html: We're at {{ result }}% of our goal!
goal.text_money_html: That’s {{ total_sold }} pledged of our {{ target }} target!
goal.text_quantity_html: That’s {{ total_sold }} pledged of our {{ target }} target!

article_item.comment_pending_html: Your comment has been submitted but needs to be approved by the store before posting. Ok, got it
article_item.comment_posted_html: Your comment bas been successfully posted! click here to see it.

general.currency_note_html: Note: all orders will be processed in {{ currency }} at the most current exchange rate.
general.empty: You don't have any items in your cart yet.
general.stock_level: Sorry, we only have {{ stock_count }} in stock.

quantity_error.title: Not available
quantity_error.message: You can only have {{ quantity }} {{ title }} in your cart.

shipping_calculator.rates_html: There are {{ number_of_rates }} shipping rates available for {{ address }}, starting at {{ rate }}.
shipping_calculator.rate: There is one shipping rate available for {{ address }}.
shipping_calculator.no_rates: We do not ship to this destination.

contact.success: Your message was sent successfully, you'll hear from us soon!
contact.error: Oops, looks like something something went wrong. Please correct the highlighted field(s) below:

map.address_query_limit_html: You have exceeded the Google API usage limit. Consider upgrading to a Premium Plan.
map.auth_error_html: There was a problem authenticating your Google Maps account. Create and enable the JavaScript API and Geocoding API permissions of your app.

orders.no_orders: You haven't placed any orders yet.

activate_account.benefits: Sign up for an account to take advantage of order history as well as pre-filled forms during checkout on subsequent orders.
activate_account.subtext: To activate your account, choose a password and enter it below.

addresses.no_address_html: You don't have any addresses saved to your account. Speed up your checkout process by adding a {{ new_address }}.

reset_password.error: There was an error resetting your password, please try again.
reset_password.new_password_for: Enter a new password for {{ email }}:
reset_password.subtext: We’ll send you an email to reset your password.
reset_password.successful_reset: We've sent you an email containing a password reset link. If you remember your password before you receive our email, feel free to log in below:

guest_login.no_login: Checkout as guest. No login required.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

product.set_quantity: Please enter a value for quantity.
product.success_html: ** product ** has been successfully added to your {{ cart_link }}. Feel free to {{ continue_link }} or {{ checkout_link }}.
product.no_product: There is no product available in this collection.
product.goal_money_html: {{ total_sold }} of {{ target }} Funded / 0 days left
product.goal_units_html: {{ total_sold }} of {{ target }} Pledged / 0 days left

slideshow_section.title: Slideshow
slideshow_section.subtitle: Introduce customers to your shop with lifestyle imagery and product photography.

twitter.tweet: Connect your Twitter account to engage customers on and off your site!

blog.title: Your post's title
blog.excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.

product_focus.title: Feature
product_focus.text: Let your customers know what details set your product apart from the competition.

technical_specifications.title: Specification
technical_specifications.text: Let your customers know what details set your product apart from the competition.

shipping.shipping_method_notice: Please enter Company name on the customer information page to receive correct quote options.

contact.company_placeholder: Company Name or First Name and Last Name, to Receive Accurate Shipping Quotes.

colors.label: Color scheme
colors.has_cards_info: To change the card color scheme, update your theme settings.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

card_styles.label: Card style
card_styles.info: Product, collection, and blog card styles can be updated in theme settings.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.info: Video plays in a pop-up if the section contains other blocks.
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video-block)

image_ratio.label: Image ratio
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

post_limit.label: Number of blog posts to show

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

show_description.label: Show collection description from the admin

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" if collection has more products than shown

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-collection-show-product-rating)

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick add button
enable_quick_buy.info: Optimal with popup or drawer cart type.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: When enabled, gift card products can optionally be sent to a recipient with a personal message.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-product-rating)

media_position.label: Desktop media position
media_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

hide_variants.label: Hide unselected variants’ media on desktop

paragraph.content: This block will display your brand information. [Edit brand information.](/editor?context=theme&category=brand%20information)

show_social.label: Show social media icons
show_social.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__8.info: To add store policies, go to your [policy settings](/admin/settings/legal).

header__9.info: Display follow button for your storefront on the Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

menu_type_desktop.label: Desktop menu type
menu_type_desktop.info: Menu type is automatically optimized for mobile.
